conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric cutaway. Clear verticality and depth.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Perfect geometric transformation. Consistent wall heights and thicknesses are clearly rendered.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is exceptionally faithful. All partitions, door swings, and window locations match the 2D source precisely.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is highly accurate, including kitchen appliances, bathroom fixtures, and bedroom layouts.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity. Minor ghosting/artifacts on door swing graphics, but structural readability is superb.

detected_errors.description: 2D arching door swing lines are rendered as physical 3D artifacts on the floor.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric alignment and furniture placement from the original layout.
